org.daisy.dotify.api.paper

Class SheetPaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.api.paper.AbstractPaper
      • org.daisy.dotify.api.paper.SheetPaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FactoryProperties, Paper

    public class SheetPaper
extends AbstractPaper
    Provides a paper object for cut-sheet paper.
